title._content: Rose Biodo, Philadelphia, 10 years old. Working 3 summers, minds baby and carries berries, two pecks at a time. Whites Bog, Brown Mills, N.J., 09/28/1910

description._content: Title: Rose Biodo, Philadelphia, 10 years old. Working 3 summers, minds baby and carries berries, two pecks at a time. Whites Bog, Brown Mills, N.J. This is the fourth week of school and the people expect to remain here two weeks more., 09/28/1910 Creator(s): Department of Commerce and Labor. Children's Bureau. (1912 - 1913) Persistent URL: arcweb.archives.gov/arc/action/ExternalIdSearch?id=523263 "Rose Biodo, Philadelphia, 10 years old...." September 28, 1910; Lewis Wickes Hine, Photographer (ARC ID 523263); National Child Labor Committee Photographs taken by Lewis Hine, ca. 1912; Records of the Children’s Bureau, 1908 - 1969; Record Group 102; National Archives. Access Restrictions: Unrestricted Use Restrictions: Unrestricted
